title: The Superhero Book: The Ultimate Encyclopedia (2004)
description:
The Superhero Book: The Ultimate Encyclopedia of Comic Book Icons and Hollywood Heroes

Visible Ink Press | 2004-10-01 | ISBN: 1578591546 | 746 pages | PDF | 32 MB










Modern mythology leaps into the popular culture from the pages of comic books and now propels the astounding growth of the graphic novel.
